text: Rūsiņš Mārtiņš Freivalds (10 November 1942 - 4 January 2016) was a Latvian computer scientist and mathematician. He was a member of Latvian Academy of Sciences from 1992. He discovered Freivalds' algorithm. He also taught at the University of Latvia with students including Daina Taimina and Andris Ambainis. He was born in Cesvaine and studied at Moscow State University (MSU). He was elected a member of the Academia Europaea in 2010. Freivalds died from a heart attack on 4 January 2016 in Riga, aged 73. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Computer scientists Category:Latvian educators Category:Latvian scientists Category:Mathematicians Category:Members of Academia Europaea
title: Rūsiņš Mārtiņš Freivalds
